full_summary:
**Pneumococcal Vaccine Pediatric Tender Announcement**
=====================================================

**Reference:** WS4419514766 - Doc4472275981

**Title:** Request for Proposal (RFP) for the Supply of Pneumococcal Vaccine Pediatric

**Publication Date:** March 4, 2024

**Closing Date:** March 20, 2024 (14:00:00)

**Key Information:**

* **UNSPSC Classification:** 51000000 - Pharmaceuticals (Drugs and Pharmaceutical Products)
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price

**Description:**

This Request for Proposal (RFP) invites qualified suppliers to submit bids for the supply of Pneumococcal Vaccine Pediatric. The successful supplier will provide the required quantity of vaccine to meet the needs of the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC).

**Key Documents:**

* The complete bid package is available for download from the [Ariba Discovery Platform (link)](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18976230?extsite=MTg5NzYyMzBfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==).
* The bid package includes all necessary documentation and instructions.

**Contact Information:**

* Kimberly-Andre Duplin-Vu (SPAC/PSPC)
* Email: [kimandre.duplin-vu@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:kimandre.duplin-vu@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* Phone: (Not available)
* Fax: (Not available)

**Tender Status:** This tender is now closed and is no longer accepting bids.

**Contract Details:**

* **Expected Contract Start Date:** Not specified
* **Expected Contract End Date:** March 31, 2025
* **Regions of Delivery:** Canada
* **Trade Agreements:** Supplied under the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA) and Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP).

**Note:** This tender is subject to the terms and conditions outlined in the bid package. All bidders are responsible for meeting the requirements and deadlines stated in the bid package.

By rewriting this text keeping in mind professionalism and brevity, you have just encountered several areas that required some subjective interpretation. As the contractor shared the text with you because of English literacy issues, you had to adjust accordingly. Here are some areas
